Package arkivmester

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchiveController
public interface ViewObserver
Interface listener for Views and ArchiveController. Implemented by the ArchiveController to subscribe to notifications by the Views. Any observer must subscribe to a Views and implement the following functions.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Magnus Sustad, Oskar Leander Melle Keogh, Esben Lomholt Bjarnason and Tobias Ellefsen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancelButton()
    Cancels the current operation and returns to MainView view.
    void chooseTests()
    Opens the choose subtests GUI.
    void editAdminInfo()
    Opens the edit administrative information GUI.
    void makeReport()
    Starts generating the full report.
    void newTest()
    Cancels current test and wants to start a new, resets GUI and backend operations.
    void saveAdminInfo()
    Saves the current information and updates ArchiveModel's adminInfoList.
    void saveTestSettings()
    Saves the current information and updates ThirdPartiesModel's selectedTests.
    void testStarted()
    Starts the test, updates GUI.
    void uploadArchive()
    Prompts the user to upload the archive to be tested.

  • Method Details

    • uploadArchive

      void uploadArchive()
      Prompts the user to upload the archive to be tested. A file explorer opens where the user can navigate to the correct folder containing only a .tar archive file and a .xml metadata file.

    • testStarted

      void testStarted() throws java.io.IOException
      Starts the test, updates GUI.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • editAdminInfo

      void editAdminInfo()
      Opens the edit administrative information GUI.

    • saveAdminInfo

      void saveAdminInfo()
      Saves the current information and updates ArchiveModel's adminInfoList.

    • chooseTests

      void chooseTests()
      Opens the choose subtests GUI.

    • saveTestSettings

      void saveTestSettings()
      Saves the current information and updates ThirdPartiesModel's selectedTests.

    • cancelButton

      void cancelButton()
      Cancels the current operation and returns to MainView view.

    • makeReport

      void makeReport()
      Starts generating the full report. Only allowed when all subtests are completed.

    • newTest

      void newTest()
      Cancels current test and wants to start a new, resets GUI and backend operations.
